categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military units

nodes.text: Draenell's Spies was a squad of ten Alliance to Restore the Republic soldiers who participated in the raid on agricultural loading platform XT-21s on Draenell's Point during the Battle of Bissillirus. They were each armed with a blaster pistol, a vibroblade, and two fragmentation grenades. The squad also carried a medium repeating blaster.
